sentences: The spin-off group on the basket of methodological issues considered outstanding technical issues in Chapter IV of the Chair s revised proposal (FCCC/KP/AWG/2010/18/Add.1).
Following discussions on new GHGs and common metrics, a drafting group, facilitated by New Zealand, convened to streamline text on these issues.

During the drafting group progress was made towards consensus on a proposed package, which could be reached if parties agree to include nitrogen trifluoride as a new GHG during the second commitment period.
Consensus was reached on inclusion of species of hydrofluorocarbons and perfluorocarbons listed in the IPCC Fourth Assessment Report (AR4) and on sulphur hexafluoride.
Progress was also made in streamlining the text on common metrics.
Discussions on these issues will continue at the resumed AWG-KP 16.
